thread.title: A Diplomat and a Gentleman: In Memory of Vitaly Churkin
thread.title_full: A Diplomat and a Gentleman: In Memory of Vitaly Churkin

title: A Diplomat and a Gentleman: In Memory of Vitaly Churkin
text:
A Diplomat and a Gentleman: In Memory of Vitaly Churkin 16:25 21.02.2017 © AFP 2016/ Timothy A. Clary © Sputnik/ Ekaterina Shtukina © AP Photo/ Craig Ruttle Vitaly Churkin was born in Moscow on February 21, 1952.Above: Russian United Nations Ambassador Vitaly Churkin addresses reporters before an expected vote by the UN Security Council at the United Nations headquarters. December 18, 2016. Vitaly Churkin, a prominent diplomat and Russia's permanent representative to the UN, passed away in New York on February 20, 2017; he would have turned 65 on February 21. 
Russia's President Vladimir Putin and diplomats from all over the world have expressed their condolences to Churkin's family, praising the late envoy's impressive record and impeccable conduct. ...
